thread.section_title: Flugladen.de Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Flugladen.de | www.flugladen.de | 10 von 313
thread.title: Subramanya Swamy

author: Subramanya Swamy
title: Subramanya Swamy
text:
I previously had normal experiences with Flugladen.de
But this time I had my worst experience with them.
They provided me a wrong flight connections (2 transits inside Saudi Arabia, which is not allowed) and later when asked for refund, they are pointing out their finger at the airlines. If you don't have enough sense to check the preconditions before sending your customers an Itinerary, you are just unfit to be in this field.
